```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(forcats)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
library(stringr)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggrepel)
library(scales)
```

```{r}
ctg <- read_csv("../Data/ctg_clean.csv")
gbd <- read_csv("../Data/cancer.csv")
```
```{r}
trials_summary <- ctg_clean %>%
  count(Condition_clean, name = "trial_count")

gbd_summary <- gbd %>%
  filter(sex == "Both", age == "Age-standardized", metric == "Rate", location == "Global") %>%
  group_by(cause) %>%
  filter(year == max(year)) %>%
  summarize(death_rate = mean(val, na.rm = TRUE)) %>%
  ungroup()

compare_df <- trials_summary %>%
  inner_join(gbd_summary, by = c("Condition_clean" = "cause")) %>%
  mutate(
    trials_share = trial_count / sum(trial_count),
    death_share = death_rate / sum(death_rate),
    ratio = trials_share / death_share,
    gap = trials_share - death_share
  )
```

```{r}
ggplot(compare_df, aes(x = death_share, y = trials_share, label = Condition_clean)) +
  geom_point(aes(size = trial_count, color = ratio > 1)) +
  geom_abline(slope = 1, intercept = 0, linetype = "dashed", color = "gray40") +
  geom_text_repel(max.overlaps = 12, size = 3) +
  scale_x_log10(labels = percent_format()) +
  scale_y_log10(labels = percent_format()) +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("TRUE" = "#2E8B57", "FALSE" = "#E74C3C"),
                     labels = c("Under-studied", "Over-studied")) +
  labs(
    title = "Clinical Trials vs. Global Death of Cancer",
    subtitle = "Comparison by cancer type (log-scaled shares)",
    x = "Burden Share (proportion of total disease rate)",
    y = "Clinical Trial Share (proportion of total trials)",
    color = "Research Attention"
  ) +
  theme_minimal(base_size = 13)

```
